Description: Red-grey pottery ostracon, from the body of a large vessel, interior slightly grooved, exterior covered with traces of a cream-coloured slip, now very worn, and only fragmentary traces of at least eleven lines of black-painted demotic text on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389825) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389825)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
